column2: One of the primary motivations for developing the GRCop-42 was the increased thermal conductivity compared

column1: to GRCop-84 due to the increased Cu content. Initial development samples tested using the Laser Flash Method21
demonstrated a 5-8% increase in conductivity over the temperature range tested as seen in Figure 15. The improved
conductivity allows for lowering the hot wall temperature to improve life, additional wall temperature margin or the
ability to operate at slightly higher performance.
